title: The Trenton Pickle Ordinance and Other Bonehead Legislation
description: All the silly laws still on the books. It is against Decateur, Ill. law to drive a car without a steering gear. California law forbids a woman to drive wearing a housecoat. Topeka Kansas passed a law forbidding people from annoying squirrels. Massachusetts makes it unlawful to duel with water pistols.
author: Dick Hyman
